mainText: Steve was the God in America. He built a strong foundation from scratch and it blossomed into something almost everyone touches in their everyday lives. I'm a new apple user of 4 years but felt like I've been a part of his family and successes for years. I just want to say I appreciate the opportunity to have grower with the company. Purchase the many products and here to see the many more products will prevail in the future. Steve will be missed.
author: Lilkem
